algorithm_technique: Iterate and sum based on digit count
problem_summary_simple: Alice wins if her sum of chosen numbers (single or double digit) is greater than Bob's.
problem_summary_technical: Calculate sums of single-digit and double-digit numbers separately. Alice wins if either sum is strictly greater than the other's.
key_insights: The problem simplifies to comparing the sum of single-digit numbers against the sum of double-digit numbers.
Alice can choose either group, so we just need to check if one group's sum is strictly greater than the other's.
The constraints on numbers (1-99) make the single/double digit split straightforward.
